name: Lotus Youth Preserve Radiance Renewal Night Cream
about: What it is: An antioxidant night cream that helps recover & reduce signs of fatigue while smoothing fine lines & improving radiance...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Super Lotus: smooths lines & helps to boost radiance..- Star fruit leaf extract: Smooths while helping to reduce visible wrinkles..- Vitamin E: Helps protect & soothe...What Else You Need to Know: This newly upgraded moisturizer works with skin’s nighttime renewal mode to help visibly recover from day’s exposure to external stressors for a rested, brighter look. Ethically sourced* Super Lotus and vitamin E protect skin, while polyglutamic acid and peach leaf extract minimize lines & pores while comforting skin...Clinical Results: In a self-assessment on 60 subjects during 4 weeks:.After 1 night, consumers saw +28% radiance*.After 28 nights, consumers saw +55% radiance** +36% smoother lines** -22% signs of fatigue** -62% visible pores***..*observed results, self-assessment by scoring, 32 subjects, 1 night **observed results, self-assessment by scoring, 32 subjects, 4 weeks ***observed results, self-assessment by scoring, 20 subjects, 4 weeks...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, C10-18 Triglycerides, Diglycerin, Myristyl Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Nelumbo Nucifera Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Leaf Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Caprylyl Glycol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Behenyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Cetyl Palmitate, Cocoglycerides, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Polyglutamate, Sodium Hydroxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Phytate, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Metabisulfite, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Citral, Linalool <18941> Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Citral, Linalool <18941>...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean skin before bed. .-Can be used nightly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a few fresh products before but reacted poorly to a rose fragrance so I avoided the entire brand. I totally regret not trying this cream sooner, I’ve tried so many creams and never have I gotten more compliments on my skin while using this!! Will definitely repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Любовь, это просто то что оно и описывает!  На ночь прекрасно увлажняет, одно из любимых кремов 100% советую

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just finished the whole tub of this product. It was just ok. I did enjoy the texture and scent. But I did not notice much of a difference in my skin and it wasn’t overly hydrating. I wouldn’t purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using it less than a week nightly my skin became red. Had to immediately stop using it. I have never experienced this with any skin product. Waste of money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has absolutely improved my skin. I’ve noticed results the first week of using it. My skin feels soft and plump all day. Non greasy and no breakouts. I have found the holy grail.

reviews.review_title: Can't deal with the awful smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way that this felt on my skin. However I really couldn't get past the smell. I tried to give it the benefit of the doubt after reading all of the reviews, but ended up returning it after 1 use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle and light, but I can still feel it on my face in the morning. I love Fresh products' ingredients and try to stick to Clean at Sephora, and this is my longstanding favorite cream to wear to bed at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t with this being considered on sale but it’s only a 1 dollar off. Smh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I’m in my 40s and have really dry skin this is the only product that helps me feel refreshed in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this night cream, my skin just looks and feels better after using it.  I have sensitive skin, and this cream didn't irritate me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am really liking this. I am trying to use clean ingredients as much as possible, so I like this aspect of it also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this for the first time in May and it has lasted me until October. I love the smell and the feel this gives my skin when I use it and wash my face in the morning. I really feel like I see a difference in my skin even when only using it for 5 months. This product is also really good for me with my dry/combo and sensitive skin. My skin is very reactive, and I had no issues with this moisturizer at all. I would definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE fresh products. I was so excited to try this.  I'm not happy with it. It's way to fragrent and it burned slightly when I put it on. It definitely did nothing good for me.  I stopped using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, I was hesitant at first to try this because I saw some reviews that said that it didn't help or the scent was bad/broke them out, but for me I didn't find this to be the case. I have dry and sensitive skin, and I have noticed a glow to my face in the mornings now. It's very exciting! The moisturizer feels lightweight, but is soooo effective. If you're looking for something that gives you that young glow and moisturizes- this is your product!

reviews.review_title: Nice smell and non greasy feeling
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like how light and refreshing my skin feels after application. It's not greasy, doesn't clog pores and has a mellow smell which I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my face bright red and unbelievably itchy. I was so hopeful that this would be a great product since so many seem to love it. Not for me. I returned it to Sephora with no problem.

reviews.review_title: My go-to for my night routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin was sensitized and somewhat dry this winter and a newly developed area of eczema on my cheek would flare with even the gentlest of moisturizers. I was worried I wouldn’t find any moisturizer that would work for me and more so, one with any anti-aging ingredients. Then I tried this miracle product. This calmed everything down and made my face absolutely glow! It exceeded my expectations in every way and it would have been an absolute keeper even if my skin hadn’t been so irritable at the time. My skin has healed and I attribute that to this product and now I’m able to use other creams without issue - but I still use this every night and can’t recommend it enough. If it works for your skin then you’re in for a real treat. It soaks in well and leaves no residue (heavy creams just sit on my face) and is very hydrating. The corresponding serum is excellent as well and isn’t harsh on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating. Great as a hand lotion, but unfortunately the fragrance was too much to be on my face, my eyes started watering. It also brought back my Milia, so this was a pass for me as a face lotion, would recommend as a hand lotion though.

I use the dermologica face wash gel and micro, then I use the fresh tea green serum , I use the dermologica dynamic retinol and then I use this ! And my face glows! I have never had any bad break outs or clogged pours using any of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good but made my face break out so bad!  Maybe wouldn’t recommend for someone with oily skin

reviews.review_title: Clogs pores badly, check ingredients before buying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure why this is listed as non-comedogenic when it has a very highly comedogenic ingredient (myristyl myristate). Made my skin break out horribly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this cream for years but the latest version I got was horrible! It didn’t sink in my skin and I felt a stinging sensation after applied! Probably the formula was changed, now I’m on a    quest to find a new night cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for over a month now and can say for sure that it isn't doing anything it claims to. My skin is always dull, dry, and flaky when I wake up. It just doesn't seem to do much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this based on reviews, but it's way too heavy for oily skin and made me breakout badly. Will be giving to my mom since she has very dry skin to se if she can use it. Definitely will be looking for a new night cream.

reviews.review_title: Going to keep an eye for more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using the Product over a few weeks saw the difference. My skin feel hydrated thanks again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this product for at least the last ten years and loved it until now. What in the world did they do to it? It doesn’t sink into my skin anymore and isn’t moisturizing like it used to be. Never purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing, my face looks so fresh, the name is right ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this for about a week and noticed a huge change in how soft my face is! Really nice nightcream, nice fresh scent, a little on the thicker side which I meed because I lean towards dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely avoid this. Sadly this has been my go to nighttime moisturizer for years. I recently repurchased it and shortly after couldn’t figure out what was making my face break out in hives. I didn’t didn’t even think it would be this since I’ve used it for years till I looked at other reviews and saw the formula change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is pretty oily, but it has been feeling dehydrated lately, so I gave this night cream a try. My skin looks so bouncy and hydrated now! I look forward to putting it on every night because I know it improves my skin with each use. Also, I love the light peachy scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product. I'm obsessed with my face lotions, having naturally dry skin. This one is easily my favorite.  I love the scent so much - not perfumey at all,  very fresh smelling in a cucumber melon spa kind of way. Feels lush and hydrating to my skin and has a lasting effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing. it's a subtle scent but it's fresh and I love it. it's hydrating as well. I woke up a bit puffy after using it so maybe don't use too much of it if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My main takeaway is that this stuff smells amazing. I can’t quite put my finger on it, but it has a peach/ juicy fruit type smell. I love it! It’s definitely very moisturizing (I have problems with dry skin and this keeps my skin hydrated). I have noticed my skin start to break out since using this, however. I can’t be 100% sure that it’s the cause, but the breakouts coincidentally started when I started this cream and I didn’t change anything else with skincare. It’s a very nice product, but I’d say for those with acne prone skin to proceed with caution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cream broke me out for like a week, nothing major though, I'm assuming it was just purging! Smells nice and makes my skin feel moisturized and healthy!

reviews.review_title: Used to love it .. they changed things
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been buying this NIGHT cream to use during the day for years. I got another stock up yesterday and immediately noticed there’s no rose smell anymore and the formula seems different. Also the front of the package is not the same and omits “night recovery” on it. Hmmm very strange. It’s not as rich as before but when I look up fresh lotus night recovery this is the product that comes up so it’s not a new product. Strange that it’s all changed without any note of that.   In the photo my hand is touching the new one. On the right is the old one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After several tries, finally landed on this exquisite night cream. It’s more expensive than I usually pay for skin care but I guess you get what you pay for. It’s silky and luxurious, not too heavy or too light, and my skin feels so soft and dewy after application. Truly worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure which ingredient in the product was the cause, but I had an allergic reaction to both this and the daytime version of this same formula. I don't usually have sensitive skin and I have used this brand before without issue so I was surprised. If you have sensitive skin, I would skip this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all this cream stinks. It’s way too much fragrance for it to be for the skin. Consistency and texture reminded me of dried out lotion someone forgot to put the lid back on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this two days ago and I put it to the the test, when I woke up my skin was hydrated, I went from reptile skin to hydrated skin, I’ve tried so many skin care products and suffer from sensitive skin. I am not a fan ofthe smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how creamy it is but the smell is terrible. Especially for a night cream I feel like the scent should be soothing/ calming. Stick with the cheaper Cerave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Radiance Day & Night Skincare Set in November 2023, which included a full size of this cream. I only got to open and use the cream this week, so I was very excited. However, I am very disappointed. To begin, the cream does not smell pleasant. When I applied it to my face, it felt heavy and did not moisturize. It also left my face oily. Definitely not worth the hefty cost. I would have been very disappointed if the set did not include an additional day moisturizer and face wash (which I have yet to try). In conclusion, it's probably best to avoid this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite moisturizers it feels so nice but expensive ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure which ingredient in the product was the cause, but I had an allergic reaction to both this and the daytime version of this same formula. I don't usually have sensitive skin and I have used this brand before without issue so I was surprised. If you have sensitive skin, I would skip this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all this cream stinks. It’s way too much fragrance for it to be for the skin. Consistency and texture reminded me of dried out lotion someone forgot to put the lid back on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this two days ago and I put it to the the test, when I woke up my skin was hydrated, I went from reptile skin to hydrated skin, I’ve tried so many skin care products and suffer from sensitive skin. I am not a fan ofthe smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how creamy it is but the smell is terrible. Especially for a night cream I feel like the scent should be soothing/ calming. Stick with the cheaper Cerave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Radiance Day & Night Skincare Set in November 2023, which included a full size of this cream. I only got to open and use the cream this week, so I was very excited. However, I am very disappointed. To begin, the cream does not smell pleasant. When I applied it to my face, it felt heavy and did not moisturize. It also left my face oily. Definitely not worth the hefty cost. I would have been very disappointed if the set did not include an additional day moisturizer and face wash (which I have yet to try). In conclusion, it's probably best to avoid this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite moisturizers it feels so nice but expensive ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I'd kept the packaging for the older version of this, so that I could know exactly which ingredient/s is not agreeing with me since they re-formulated it. I'm guessing it's 'Myristyl Myristate' - which is a highly comedogenic ingredient. Guess I'll never know! What I do know is, that this used to be (odd fragrance aside) a very good night moisturizer, not too heavy, sank in nicely and kept my face feeling comfortable and hydrated. This is no longer the case...acne pops up by the second night of using it, and my skin feels slightly itchy overnight, even into the following day. Something has changed in this and not for the better!  ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: ‘Peter Thomas Roth’ – Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: ‘Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: ‘Nuxe’ – Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: ‘Sephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product my skin started to breakout. I loved Fresh Black Tea and never had issues with that cream but not this one. The fragrance is also way too strong for a face cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If I could find photo reviews that weren’t incentivized, with pics of literally just the jar or people using it on their hands and globbing it on their face, I might find these reviews more believable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t hate it or love it. Used for a couple of weeks and I didn’t notice any difference in my, its quite fragrant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the moisture - can’t stand the smell. Reminds me of peach vodka from college and makes me want to gag…. I want to love this so much but the smell took me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my everyday holy grail product. They changed the formula and it’s so bad. Feels like a cheap silicone cream. Not hydrating and the pleasant luxurious smell has also been removed. Change the formula back to what it was or so help me god!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I'd kept the packaging for the older version of this, so that I could know exactly which ingredient/s is not agreeing with me since they re-formulated it. I'm guessing it's 'Myristyl Myristate' - which is a highly comedogenic ingredient. Guess I'll never know! What I do know is, that this used to be (odd fragrance aside) a very good night moisturizer, not too heavy, sank in nicely and kept my face feeling comfortable and hydrated.
